meta.description: Optimize the number of cows, sheep, and chickens to maximize profit.

sets.name: ANIMALS
sets.description: Types of animals on the farm

params.name: selling_price
params.description: Selling price for each type of animal

params.name: feed_cost
params.description: Feed cost for each type of animal

params.name: manure_production
params.description: Manure production per day for each type of animal

vars.name: num_animals
vars.description: Number of each type of animal

objective.name: max_profit
objective.expr: sum((selling_price[a] - feed_cost[a]) * num_animals[a] for a in ANIMALS)
objective.description: Maximize the profit from selling animals after accounting for feed costs

constraints.name: manure_limit
constraints.description: Total manure production must not exceed cleaning capacity

constraints.name: chicken_limit
constraints.description: Maximum number of chickens due to farm size

constraints.name: min_cows
constraints.description: Minimum number of cows to meet customer demand

constraints.name: min_sheep
constraints.description: Minimum number of sheep to meet customer demand

constraints.name: total_animals_limit
constraints.description: Total number of animals cannot exceed farm capacity
